item.title: Index Lab Notes
item.description: Lab 01 Introduction to SQL Server Management Studio Lab 02 Storage and file structure Lab 03 Indexing

item.title: Lab 01 - Introduction to SQL Server Management Studio
item.description: Lab01 1 SETSTATISTICSIOON Causes SQL Server to display information about the amount of physical and logical IO activity generated by Transact-SQL statements.

item.title: Lab 02 - Storage and file structure
item.description: Lab02 .mdf files* Data files contain data and objects such as tables, indexes, stored procedures, and views. large file (in the AdventureWorks2019 DB Properties, this file has an unlimited MAXSIZE)

item.title: Lab 03 - Indexing
item.description: Lab03 Index Info 1 EXECsp_helpindex'Person.Person'; Lists any indexes on a table, including indexes created by defining unique or primary key constraints defined by a create table or alter table statement.
